column5: Really looking forward to the BIG SHOW and lets see Vancouver overcome the weather adversaries and show the world how its done.
yeah im kinda stoked for the competitions too...."destinity doesnt drive two hours for a practice or get right back up"
not looking good there....pineapple express comin in...gonna be a wee bit wet at cypress

hockey is all im lookin forward too. the rest i can do with out, rather boring. its 2 weeks of nuthin on tv but olympics.  only thing i can say, is that they are all there for their countries... not a number on a pay cheque.

My nephew Hans was lucky enough to be picked out of a group in Toronto to attend the olympics as an official for the snowboard events. He will be standing at the end gates as the boarders finish their runs. Keep an eye out for him..... He is is now there grooming the track in preparation for the opener. Lucky kid !! Looks like they got enough snow to get things underway    Cheers !!
